body:
Looks like there is another issue with https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/8136 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install petsc
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
 18.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.2.0
``` 

### Additional information

Config error:

```
TESTING: checkFortranLibraries from config.compilers(/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/petsc-3.10.3-evliwv62eoiayypwpjzijvk64wble5xb/petsc-3.10.3/config/BuildSystem/config/compilers.py:868)
*******************************************************************************
         UNABLE to CONFIGURE with GIVEN OPTIONS    (see configure.log for details):
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fortran libraries cannot be used with C compiler
*******************************************************************************
```
title: Installation issue: petsc
